summary: Completed backend and frontend testing of construction site management app supervisor workflow. All tests passed successfully.
critical_code_review_comments: The code changes for STT fix are correct - using UserMessage object instead of plain string for LlmChat.send_message()
Dashboard correctly implements step-by-step workflow: Check-in → Select Project → DPR/Workers Log
Voice-to-text endpoint properly handles base64 audio and uses Whisper for transcription with translation
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created. Used existing Sample Construction Project (PROJ001)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend API tests are in /app/backend/tests/test_api.py. All STT, Auth, DPR and Project endpoints tested. Supervisor workflow works: Login → Check-in (web simulation) → Select Project → Create DPR. Voice-to-text endpoint tested with backend tests.

frontend_tests.dashboard_check_in_first: PASSED - Check-in Required displayed first with other options disabled
frontend_tests.check_in_flow: PASSED - Web simulates check-in, shows Checked In status
frontend_tests.project_selection: PASSED - Select Project enabled after check-in
frontend_tests.dpr_creation_page: PASSED - Voice Summary section with 'Any language → English' label visible
frontend_tests.voice_recording_ui: PASSED - Hold to Record button and helper text visible

features_verified.dashboard_workflow: VERIFIED - Check-in → Select Project → DPR/Workers flow works
